events.message: I received my new wireless headphones yesterday, but the left earcup is producing crackling sounds and sometimes no audio at all.
The reported issue matches the product defect cluster due to the faulty audio in the left earcup.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle this headphone defect complaint.
Hello, I’m John from the support team. I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your headphones. Let’s see how we can fix this for you.
Could you please confirm if you have tried using the headphones with a different device or charging them fully to rule out any connection or battery issues?
I tested the headphones on two different phones and fully charged the battery several times, but the problem with the left earcup crackling and no audio remains.
Thank you for confirming. We can offer you a replacement unit or arrange a repair free of charge. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement unit, please. I rely on these headphones daily and want a working device as soon as possible.
We have processed your replacement order and you will receive a new unit within 5 working days at no extra cost. A return label for the defective headphones will be sent shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you received your replacement headphones and that they are working properly. Please reach out if you have any further issues.
Since you haven’t reported any more problems, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
